span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 预先阻止： to delay, hinder, or prevent by taking precautionary measures beforehand
【例】 You can often forestall skidding on the ice simply by driving more slowly. 通常你只需慢点开车就可以防止车辆在冰面上失控打滑
【近】 avert, deter, obviate, preclude, prevent
【反】 abet, assist, facilitate, further, precipitate, promote 帮助，促进

【记】 fore 前 + stall 货摊，提前出摊，抢占地方→先发制人，阻止他人
